name: Receive a Google Chrome notification with the caller's details retrieved from Pipedrive before you answer a call on your Android device
description: Every time your Android device starts ringing, Make will automatically look up the number of the caller in Pipedrive and add a new activity (call) to the related person in Pipedrive. If it does not find the number in Pipedrive, it will create a new person and add the call as a new activity. Subsequently, you will be sent a push notification with the caller details from Pipedrive via Google Chrome.
